game.name: Rise Up Up
game.description:
Suppose you have given a life of a balloon in this world and, you have decided to fly to the highest sky! Does it sound interesting? However, it is not going to be very easy at all as your entire path is full of obstacles that will try to stop your way while moving upward. The truth is that man deadly obstacles are waiting for you in your ascending process. It is up to your skills how you help your balloon to avoid them and help it to spot the way for flying high in this cool html5 escaping game. 

Join Rise Up game and prove the world that you have the habit of flying high whether you are a human being or a balloon! You have to keep your eyes on the screen and put your fingers on desktop to click or tap the screen on mobile phone or tablet to avoid the obstacles on its way. All the obstacles available in the sky aim at destroying your balloon. Control a ball properly to keep the balloon away from such problems in this one of the best adventure games for boys!

There are many levels to pass to check your escaping skills in this fun arcade game. Guard your balloon from the falling blocks and show off the world that you have amazing protecting skills! Many unknown structures like triangles, beams, blocks and other shapes will try to come and stop your way. Push all the heavy and sharp objects aside through the dot you see above the balloon to make it fly high! Your balloon will pop up if it touches any of the hindrances. Good luck to try more flying games for free, no download required!

game.mobileControlKeys: KEEP PRESS AND SWIPE THE DOT TO SAVE THE BALLON FROM HURDULES
game.webControlKeys: KEEP PRESS THE BUBBLE AND MOVE TO MAKE THE WAY CLEAR FOR BALLON
